Reviews.Title: Worst!!
Reviews.Author: DAT HUYNH
Reviews.Content: Should mever buy this product!! When I first saw this product, I thought it would be great to monitor my business from home. But it turned out to be the worst system I have ever used. The instruction is unclear, support team is a rip off!!  Don't waste your money on this product

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Cgray3ulv
Reviews.Content: Absolutely love it! I bought this for my home and will be buying a second for my daughters business very soon.

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Sue Yeager
Reviews.Content: I really do like this camera kit. It comes with four cameras, so enough to place around our office. The price is very reasonable and less expensive than other websites I visited for pricing. As a matter of fact, I have purchased a total of four of these for my companies other buildings. It would be great if the monitor was larger but in all, it's a great value.

ProductInfo.Features:
Advanced H.264 Video Compression with 7 Inch LCD display
CIF Real-Time Recording (30FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 120FPS Total) / D1 Recording Option (7.5FPS per channel x 4 cameras = 30FPS Total)
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote PC, iPhone, iPad, Blackberry Curve 8900, Bold 9000?9700 only,
And other Supported Smartphone Running Windows Mobile Pro or Symbian on 3G Networks.
Trigger Email Alerts on Motion Detection Events
Pre-Installed 320GB Hard Drive
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QR4274-418-3 7-Inch Retractable LCD with Built-in 4-Channel H.264 Real-Time Surveillance DVR 4 CCD Color Camera Kits Pre-Installed 320 GB Hard Drive
